name: Bridget
description: A water-themed magical girl with powerful healing abilities. Her attacks create beautiful aquatic displays that both damage enemies and nurture allies.

passive.name: Aqua Life Essence
passive.description: 16% of damage you deal heals a random ally and yourself for the same amount.

abilities.name: Ribbon Wave Rush
abilities.description: Summon a waterfall that hits two random enemies for {baseDamage} + 100% Magical damage.

abilities.name: Bubble Beam Barrage
abilities.description: Shoots between 3-7 bubble beams onto random enemies each dealing 125% Magical Damage. Cooldown: 5 turns. The passive healing effect from Aqua Life Essence applies to the total damage dealt.
abilities.baseDescription: Shoots between 3-7 bubble beams onto random enemies each dealing {damageScaling}% Magical Damage. Cooldown: {cooldown} turns.

abilities.name: Arcane Bubble Shield
abilities.description: Creates a water shield that increases magic shield by 12% for 3 turns and summons 3 magical bubbles that automatically target allies or enemies at the end of each turn. Cooldown: 10 turns.

abilities.name: Wave Crush
abilities.description: Unleash a devastating wave, dealing 700 magical damage to all enemies and healing all allies for 500 HP. Triggers Aqua Life Essence based on damage dealt. Cooldown: 18 turns.
